name: assets
purpose: Contains all the assets required in project

children.name: icons
children.purpose: Local data caching and storage implementation.

children.name: images
children.purpose: Platform channels specific to this feature.

children.name: jsons
children.purpose: Dependency injection setup for the data layer of this feature.

children.name: typefaces
children.purpose: Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for remote and local data sources.

children.name: textures
children.purpose: API clients, network requests, and communication with remote sources.
